item.title: Wine-Braised Beef with Garlic Butter Potatoes
item.description: This recipe resulted in a flavorful braised beef. It's quite simple to make although it takes nearly 2 hours to cook. The recipe is from "Culinária Portuguesa". As for the garlic and parsley butter, it's a family recipe and it's incredibly good. In potatoes, on top of a steak, it doesn't matter. It's just good. Ingredients (6 servings) For the Braised Beef: 1kg stewing beef 2 medium onions 2 red peppers 3 tomatoes 2 garlic cloves 1 bay leaf bunch fresh parsley 3dl (1 1/4 cups) white wine 1 tablespoon vinegar 1dl (1/3 cup) olive oil bacon, salt, pepper q.
